title: MetaMaster
text: Let’s build master meta data: (1) download raw data via Lime Survey API. (2) build master meta data based raw data. (3) run consistency checks inspect results email report. (4) update results database. build() function runs steps sequence: following console displays build() function next section outlines happens hood.
code: build(send_report = TRUE, update = TRUE)  # ℹ Starting the build process... # ℹ Fetching raw meta data from Lime Survey # ✔ Raw meta data exported.                           # ℹ Building metadata for the master data... # ✔ MetaMaster exported.                   # ✔ The table 'metadata_raw' has been successfully uploaded to the database. # ℹ Sending the report... # The email message was sent successfully.                        # ✔ By the power of Grayskull: Building process completed. #Build the Meta Master Data build #> function (send_report = FALSE, update = FALSE)  #> { #>     if (!Sys.getenv("R_CONFIG_ACTIVE") == "test") { #>         cli::cli_abort("Please set the environment variable R_CONFIG_ACTIVE to 'test'.") #>     } #>     cli::cli_alert_info("Starting the build process...") #>     cli::cli_alert_info("Fetching raw meta data from Lime Survey") #>     LS_GetMasterData(export = TRUE) #>     cli::cli_alert_info("Building metadata for the master data...") #>     prepare_RawMeta(path = "metadata_raw.xlsx", export = TRUE) #>     if (update) { #>         metadata_raw <- readxl::read_excel("metadata_raw.xlsx") #>         DB_send(metadata_raw, "metadata_raw") #>     } #>     else { #>         cli::cli_alert_warning("Skipping the update step. To update the DB, set update = TRUE.") #>     } #>     cli::cli_alert_info("Keep in mind that the sets and plots_headers* tables are not updated. Use DB_MetaUpdate to update them.") #>     if (send_report) { #>         cli::cli_alert_info("Sending the report...") #>         send_Report() #>     } #>     else { #>         cli::cli_alert_warning("Skipping the report send step. To send the report, set send_report = TRUE.") #>     } #>     cli::cli_alert_success("By the power of Grayskull: Building process completed.") #> } #> <bytecode: 0x55a59998af30> #> <environment: namespace:MetaMaster>

title: MetaMaster
text: first relevant step, LS_GetMasterData() function creates raw meta data. function gets master templates LimeSurvey API retrieves master survey question, id, . function returns tibble exports data export parameter set TRUE. LS_GetMasterData() wrapper function combines LS_GetMasterTemplates() LS_GetMasterQuestions() function. hood, LS_GetMasterTemplates() function returns templates Lime Survey API name start master_. precisely, returns tibble survey id, survey title, template name (master template file). LS_GetMasterQuestions() function gets survey questions specific master template. function needs survey id template name input. function returns tibble survey id, template name, plot, variable, text, filter indicator. next step, prepare_RawMeta() function convert raw data master meta data. Based raw data, build two important tables. templates table contains information used report templates. report table contains information individual variables, plots, labels report. automatically updated update parameter set TRUE. addition, meta data includes tables (!) generated automatically. Let’s revise DB_Table() function, grabs table data base. Two different types tables generated automatically. minor concern since small easy handle. First, sets table contains information (color) sets, labels, . Second, header_reports table contains information plot name header(s) printed report. tables small need create automatically, mean errors tables affect reporting. Irrespective table, MetaMaster comes several check_* functions consistency checks (see next section details). check_* functions included build() function. precisely, blastula package used create email check_* functions embedded email template runs automatically set send_report parameter TRUE (Iannone Cheng 2024). next image shows preview email.  Thus, ehe email shows results consistency checks includes MetaMaster data attachment. order use feature, set corresponding paramters config.yml file need provide mail credentials (saved my_mail_creds) available. default, email sent OES email address.
code: #Get the survey questions for the first three master templates LS_GetMasterData(export = TRUE) # ✔ Master Data exported. LS_GetMasterTemplates(template = TRUE) # # A tibble: 95 × 3 #    sid    surveyls_title                       template                        #    <chr>  <chr>                                <chr>                           #  1 197865 master_01_bfr_allg_gm_elt_00_2022_v4 tmpl_bfr_allg_gm_elt_00_2022_p1 #  2 197865 master_01_bfr_allg_gm_elt_00_2022_v4 tmpl_bfr_allg_gm_elt_00_2022_p3 #  3 197865 master_01_bfr_allg_gm_elt_00_2022_v4 tmpl_bfr_allg_rs_elt_00_2022_p1 #  4 197865 master_01_bfr_allg_gm_elt_00_2022_v4 tmpl_bfr_beru_ws_elt_00_2022_p1 #  5 943467 master_02_bfr_allg_gm_elt_01_2022_v4 tmpl_bfr_allg_gm_elt_01_2022_p2 #  6 943467 master_02_bfr_allg_gm_elt_01_2022_v4 tmpl_bfr_allg_gm_elt_01_2022_p4 # title: MetaMaster
text: MetaMaster contains helper functions work Lime Survey API. Functions check consitency meta data; functions interact Lime Survey API; functions create test scenarios. following section provides short overview.

title: MetaMaster
text: check_distinct() function checks distinctness survey questions. Based raw data, function counts unique variable names text. Next, counts returns appear . latter means variable names text uniquely used. check_MasterTemplates() function checks master templates listed master_to_template table LimeSurvey vice versa. check_SurveyTemplates() function checks survey templates listed master_to_template table meta data. addition, package check function tables build via LimeSurvey API. function run standard checks prevent common errors regard reporting. Thus, check names expected, missing values created chance .
code: check_distinct(ubb = TRUE) # ✖ Thou shalt not pass! Please check these duplicates: # # A tibble: 59 × 3 # # Groups:   variable [27] #    variable  text                                                                              n #    <chr>     <chr>                                                                         <int> #  1 A112a     Die LK achtet konsequent auf die Einhaltung von Regeln.                           2 #  2 A112a     Die LK achtet auf die Einhaltung von Regeln.                                      2 #  3 A112b     Die SuS beachten die vereinbarten Regeln.                                         2 #  4 A112b     Die LK achtet konsequent auf die Einhaltung von Regeln.                           2 #  5 A113      Die LK geht mit Blick auf die Gruppe und den Einzelnen angemessen mit Störun…     2 #  6 A113      Die LK geht angemessen mit Störungen um.                                          2 #  7 A114      Die SuS reagieren auf Signale oder Hinweise der LK.                               2 #  8 A114      Die SuS beachten die vereinbarten Regeln.                                         2 #  9 A131W121b Die SuS pflegen einen wertschätzenden Umgang.                                     2 # 10 A131W121b Die SuS pflegen einen wertschätzenden Umgang                                      2 # # ℹ 49 more rows # # ℹ Use `print(n = ...)` to see more rows check_MasterTemplates() #✔ All Masters templates found in LimeSurvey (et vice versa). check_SurveyTemplates() #✔ All survey templates found in meta data. #Check the sets check_Sets() # ℹ Checking sets data. # ✖ Some sets are not defined but are listed in the reports data. Check: "Freitext" and "NA". check_Headers() # ℹ Checking header reports data. # ✔ The header_reports data looks awesome!

title: MetaMaster
text: LS_SendSurvey() function sends survey template Lime Survey. function needs path survey template name survey template. expects survey template LimeSurvey LSS format. LS_SendSurveys() function wrapper around LS_SendSurvey(). sends survey templates working directory Lime Survey.

title: MetaMaster
text: LS_DeleteSurvey() function deletes survey LimeSurvey. function needs survey ID survey template. careful, way restore deleted survey.

title: MetaMaster
text: Note Lime Survey templates (LSS) stored database can make update via DB_UploadLSS() function. similar sense, LS_UploadTemplates() function uploads Lime Survey master templates via API. takes master template uploads survey template Lime Survey.
code: lss_surveys <- DB_Table("lss_surveys") lss_surveys$survey_data  # A tibble: 38 × 4 # id file_id master                               survey_data                               #    <int> <chr>   <chr>                                <pq_xml>                           #  1   384 153447  master_11_bfr_allg_gy_sus_00_2022_v4 <document> #   <LimeSurveyDocType>Survey</LimeSurveyDocType> #   <DBVersi… #  2   385 165568  master_17_bfr_allg_rs_sus_00_2022_v4 <document> #   <LimeSurveyDocType>Survey</LimeSurveyDocType> #   <DBVersi… #  3   386 197211  tmpl_bfr_allg_gy_elt_01_2022_p2      <document> #   <LimeSurveyDocType>Survey</LimeSurveyDocType> #   <DBVersi… #  4   387 197865  tmpl_bfr_allg_gm_elt_00_2022_p1      <document> #   <LimeSurveyDocType>Survey</LimeSurveyDocType> #   <DBVersi… #  5   388 311393  master_21_bfr_beru_bq_sus_00_2022_v4 <document> #   <LimeSurveyDocType>Survey</LimeSurveyDocType> #   <DBVersi… LS_UploadTemplates()

title: Authors and Citation
text: Edgar Treischl. Author, maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Treischl E (2024). MetaMaster: Master Meta Data Universe. R package version 0.0.1.
code: @Manual{,   title = {MetaMaster: Be the Master of the Meta Data Universe},   author = {Edgar Treischl},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 0.0.1}, }

what: Be the Master of the Meta Data Universe
title: Be the Master of the Meta Data Universe
text: MetaMaster package creates master meta data. latter meta data Lime Survey reproducible, tested, - consequence - error-free. end, package provides functions exchange data via Lime Survey API (LS_*) functions work PostgreSQL (DB_*) database. Furthermore, package introduces consistency checks helpers automate process build meta data Lime Survey.

title: Be the Master of the Meta Data Universe
text: can install development version MetaMaster like:
code: # install_local from installs the package and its dependencies remotes::install_local("MetaMaster.gz",                        dependencies = TRUE)

title: Be the Master of the Meta Data Universe
text: Build MetaMaster: Read Get Started vignette details MetaMaster works.
code: MetaMaster::build(send_report = TRUE, update = TRUE)  # ℹ Starting the build process... # ℹ Fetching raw meta data from Lime Survey # ✔ Raw meta data exported.                           # ℹ Building metadata for the master data... # ✔ MetaMaster exported.                   # ✔ The table 'metadata_raw' has been successfully uploaded to the database. # ℹ Sending the report... # The email message was sent successfully.                        # ✔ By the power of Grayskull: Building process completed.

text: Initial submission. Error Master Template: master_12_bfr_allg_ms_elt_00_2022_v4: rpt_sus_p2 Error master_26_bfr_zspf_fz_elt_01_2022_v4 != “rpt_elt_fz p2”
